name: Leg Raise
how_to_perform:
1. Lie on your back with your arms extended overhead and legs straight.
2. Engage your core by pulling your belly button towards your spine, ensuring that your hips do not sag or pike upwards throughout the movement.
3. Slowly lift your left leg up, keeping it straight, and hold for a brief moment at the top of the movement.
4. Lower your leg back down to the starting position without touching the floor, instead hover for a brief moment before raising it again.
5. Alternate legs with each rep, following the sequence: Left leg raised, hovered, left leg lowered -> right leg raised, hovered, right leg lowered.
6. Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, focusing on maintaining control and engaging your core throughout the exercise.
short_summary: Leg raises are a targeted exercise that isolate the abdominal muscles, particularly the lower abs. It can be performed as a core-only exercise or paired with other movements to enhance overall fitness.
